article.title: Goodrich Corporation to Provide Additional Laser Detecting Sets
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Goodrich Corporation, Danbury, Connecticut, was awarded a $36,280,000 firm-fixed-price contract modification to procure additional AVR-2B(V) laser detecting sets. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Fort Monmouth, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
